title: Wait For The Rain - Maria Murnane
description:

Her ex-husband is getting remarried, her teenage daughter hardly needs her anymore, and the career she once dreamed about has somehow slipped from her grasp. SheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s almost lost sight of the spirited and optimistic young woman she used to be.

As she heads off to a Caribbean island to mark the new decade with her best friends from college, DaphneÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s in anything but the mood to celebrate. But when she meets Clay Hanson, a much younger man, she ignores her inner voice warning her that sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s too old for a fling. With the help of her friends, Daphne rediscovers her enthusiasm for life, as well as her love for herselfÃ¢â‚¬â€and realizes that her best years are still ahead
